alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Harlan; Kearney; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 17 at 6:29PM CDT until May 17 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Franklin County in south central Nebraska... Southeastern Phelps County in south central Nebraska... Southwestern Kearney County in south central Nebraska... Northeastern Harlan County in south central Nebraska... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 629 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was centered between Huntley and Ragan , or 13 miles south of Holdrege, generally moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Franklin, southeastern Phelps, southwestern Kearney and northeastern Harlan Counties. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
